mapper.select: SELECT A.DEVICECODE, A.LOTNO,A.PUMCODE,B.PUMNAME,B.GIJONG,A.PUMBUN, B.CNT,B.MATERIAL, B.DANJUNG,B.DEEPL,B.DEEPH, B.SURFHARD,B.INSHARD,B.CYCLETIME, A.STARTTIME,A.STARTCARB,A.ENDCARB,A.ENDSALT,A.STARTWASH, A.ENDWASH,A.ENDTIME, ROUND(A.SET_TMP1,3) AS SET_TMP1, ROUND(A.SET_TMP2,3) AS SET_TMP2, ROUND(A.SET_TMP3,3) AS SET_TMP3, ROUND(A.SET_TMP4,3) AS SET_TMP4, ROUND(A.ACTION_TMP1,3) AS ACTION_TMP1 ,ROUND(A.ACTION_TMP2,3) AS ACTION_TMP2, ROUND(A.ACTION_TMP3,3) AS ACTION_TMP3, ROUND(A.ACTION_TMP4,3) AS ACTION_TMP4, ROUND(A.SET_CP1,3) AS SET_CP1,ROUND(A.SET_CP2,3) AS SET_CP2,ROUND(A.SET_CP3,3) AS SET_CP3, ROUND(A.ACTION_CP1,3) AS ACTION_CP1, ROUND(A.ACTION_CP2,3) AS ACTION_CP2, ROUND(A.ACTION_CP3,3) AS ACTION_CP3, A.CYC1_TIME,A.CYC2_TIME,A.CYC3_TIME,A.CYC4_TIME,A.MESLOT FROM t_siljuk A, t_product B WHERE A.PUMCODE = B.DOBUN AND A.LOTNO = #{lotno}

SELECT A.DEVICECODE, A.PUMCODE, B.GIJONG, A.STARTTIME, A.ENDSALT, A.MESLOT, A.LOTNO, B.PUMNAME, A.LOADCNT, A.ENDTIME, A.REMARK FROM t_siljuk AS A INNER JOIN t_product AS B ON A.pumcode = B.dobun WHERE A.LOTNO = #{lotno}

SELECT A.LOTNO, A.PUMCODE, B.PUMNAME, B.GIJONG, A.PUMBUN, B.CNT, B.MATERIAL, B.DANJUNG, B.DEEPL, B.DEEPH, B.SURFHARD, B.INSHARD, B.CYCLETIME, A.STARTTIME, A.STARTCARB, A.ENDCARB, A.ENDSALT, A.STARTWASH, A.ENDWASH, A.ENDTIME, ROUND(A.SET_TMP1, 3) AS SET_TMP1, ROUND(A.SET_TMP2, 3) AS SET_TMP2, ROUND(A.SET_TMP3, 3) AS SET_TMP3, ROUND(A.SET_TMP4, 3) AS SET_TMP4, ROUND(A.ACTION_TMP1, 3) AS ACTION_TMP1, ROUND(A.ACTION_TMP2, 3) AS ACTION_TMP2, ROUND(A.ACTION_TMP3, 3) AS ACTION_TMP3, ROUND(A.ACTION_TMP4, 3) AS ACTION_TMP4, ROUND(A.SET_CP1, 3) AS SET_CP1, ROUND(A.SET_CP2, 3) AS SET_CP2, ROUND(A.SET_CP3, 3) AS SET_CP3, ROUND(A.ACTION_CP1, 3) AS ACTION_CP1, ROUND(A.ACTION_CP2, 3) AS ACTION_CP2, ROUND(A.ACTION_CP3, 3) AS ACTION_CP3, A.STARTTIME, A.STARTCARB, A.CYC1_TIME, A.CYC2_TIME, A.CYC3_TIME, A.CYC4_TIME, A.MESLOT FROM t_siljuk A FULL OUTER JOIN t_product B ON A.PUMCODE = B.PUMCODE WHERE A.LOTNO = #{lotno}
SELECT LIST_YEAR, LOTNO, CYCLENO, PUMBUN, AGITATE_RPM, DEVICECODE, COMMON_DEVICE, MESLOT FROM T_WAITLIST WHERE LIST_YEAR = (SELECT MIN(LIST_YEAR) FROM T_WAITLIST WHERE PLC = '0')
